title: OBS LEAGUE STREAM HELP
body: There is a setting which allows your to switch your current windows (example) Windows 7, into an older version which makes your windows look more basic but it help you stream because it isnt taking as much to run windows or whatever it does. I used to have it in that setting but now I dont. How do i change it so that it switches to that setting while streaming or how do i change it in general. Sorry for the shitty description of what im talking about. Thank you

replies.body:
What you're looking for is to have OBS disable Windows Aero. I don't have OBS installed on this PC, so I cannot 100% confirm this is up to date, but I found an old post on OBS' site that said the following steps should enable this.

Settings -> Video -> Disable Aero at startup

Let me know if this worked!
